title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically only, the tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and frames should not flash excessively when resizing the window vertically.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Run the control example. 2. Resize the window vertically only. 3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash excessively.
